mapper.insert: INSERT INTO StockDetail(id, stockcode, name, industryType, companyType, price, lastprice, open, highest, lowest, tradingVolume, createdTime, sharesTraded, turnover) VALUES(#{id}, #{stockcode}, #{name}, #{industryType}, #{companyType}, #{price}, #{lastprice}, #{open}, #{highest}, #{lowest}, #{tradingVolume}, #{createdTime}, #{sharesTraded}, #{turnover}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE price=#{price}, lastprice=#{lastprice}, open=#{open}, highest=#{highest}, lowest=#{lowest}, tradingVolume=#{tradingVolume}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM StockDetail WHERE stockcode=#{stockcode} AND createdTime=#{createdTime}
